explanation:
## í’€ì´ í•´ì„¤

```python
n = int(input())
for i in range(1, n + 1):
    if i % 15 == 0:
        print("FizzBuzz")
    elif i % 3 == 0:
        print("Fizz")
    elif i % 5 == 0:
        print("Buzz")
    else:
        print(i)
```
